Dash Wallet is no longer linked to your Uphold account.
The Uphold service is not available. Please try again later.
Please report this issue to the Dash Wallet support team using "Report Issue" from the main menu.
Error
Uphold error
Your Uphold account isn’t verified yet. Funds cannot be withdrawn.

Your Uphold account has been flagged for review.

Uphold has temporarily restricted your account and you won’t be able to withdraw funds.

%s
Uphold will be in touch to help you sort this out quickly.

Please go to your Uphold account to verify your identity.
Please contact Uphold to update your proof of address.
Uphold funds are locked for 24 hours.\n\nYou will have sufficient funds for this transfer by %s.
Uphold funds (%1$s %2$s) are locked for up to 65 days.\n\nYou will have sufficient funds for this transfer by %3$s.
You do not have sufficient funds for this transfer
The amount to transfer should be less than %s DASH.
The amount to transfer should be more than %s DASH.
Cannot transfer that much with this app (max $3000)
Uphold funds are locked due to a recent password change.\n\nYou must wait until %s before you can transfer funds.
Uphold funds are locked due to a recent authentication method change.\n\nYou must wait until %s before you can transfer funds.
